animeDescription: This movie is the compilation of the 27 mini-parody episode trailers that ran at the end of every Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight episode, which featured characters depicted in their chibi forms.
animeRelated: ['Full story: Lodoss-tou Senki: Eiyuu Kishi Den']
